name: Dreamscape
text: Where beauty and corruption collide in an ever-evolving dance. Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream reward track.

name: Xavius
text: Being transformed into a tree can make you a bit... twisted. Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream reward track.

name: Emerald Nightmare
text:
A blossoming dream can still wither into a nightmare.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, May 2025.

name: Vivian
text:
Not every poison is easy to use, but that never stopped her from trying.

Purchasable when available in the shop.
